Reviews.Content: husband stayed 1 night nearby bright clean balcony bathroom little service quickly easily ppol hot day near people restaurant bar downstairs convenient breakfast staff fine help pleasant nice easy walk markets chinatown darling harbour

Reviews.Title: “Not bad but not the best”
Reviews.Author: Becz-Awa
Reviews.Content: discovered arrival couldnt check 9 hour flight 2pm 930am requested check time wouldnt check allow leave luggage left sights sydney 9 hour flight staff friendly service wasnt rave didnt gym look looked swimming pool size clean comfortable bed view buildings bathroom tiny bit run looked service menu overpriced location isnt bad eat night instead expensive hotel harbour overall bad ive stayed hotels

Reviews.Title: “Sooooo overpriced...nice staff, otherwise a rip off”
Reviews.Author: luciaandwills
Reviews.Content: ive night citigate paid wait 274 wotif night fairness ill stuff 11am checkout nice staff helpful friendly wide comfortable bed flight totally exhausted ready sleep booked hotel treat staff helped bags supernice kicker stayed circa 1990 lot wear tear result stained bath grouting basin isnt world dont mind getting 5 star treatment mind im paying hotel dodgy city night yelling squealing alley downstairs woke 20 minutes poor soundproofing windows 3 morning partygoers coming floor woke upno soundproofing door im light sleeper pretty achievement finally 5 30am drunk angry guest started beating door mine yelling woke freaked hell called reception nice tried people arguing obviously hotel cant control people noise alley corridor equally obvious happen whats hotel cant sleep mirvac hotel sebel sydney favourite costs half mirvac lot charge poor product frankly id money
